articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary from Paisley and follow text updates and match stats as St Mirren host Rangers in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: St Mirren vs Rangers LIVE: Scottish Premiership radio, team news, updates, report, reaction & stats

articles.description: Follow build-up as Crystal Palace take on Nottingham Forest and Everton face Brighton with radio commentaries, team news, live text and score updates as it happens.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Crystal Palace vs Nottingham Forest & Everton vs Brighton - scores & radio

articles.description: Follow live coverage with text and score updates as Ireland open their campaign against Japan at Franklin's Gardens, Northampton.
articles.title: Ireland vs Japan LIVE: Women's Rugby World Cup kick-off time, lineups, TV & updates

articles.description: Chelsea allow midfielder Carney Chukwuemeka and defender Aaron Anselmino to complete moves to Dortmund - taking money raised from summer sales to £270m.
articles.title: Chelsea transfers: Carney Chukwuemeka and Aaron Anselmino fly to Dortmund

articles.description: Many Aston Villa fans blame the financial rules for holding them back, but should the club take any of the blame?
articles.title: Aston Villa: PSR or mismanagement? Club face harsh financial reality

articles.description: Max Dowman becomes Arsenal's second-youngest player and wins a penalty on his Premier League debut against Leeds aged 15 years and 234 days.
articles.title: Max Dowman - Arsenal's 15-year-old shines on Premier League debut against Leeds

articles.description: Argentina record a first home win over New Zealand with a 29-23 victory in the Rugby Championship in front of a raucous crowd in Buenos Aires.
articles.title: Argentina 29-23 New Zealand: Pumas stun All Blacks in Buenos Aries

articles.description: With the US Open starting on Sunday, Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz are the men to beat, while Aryna Sabalenka aims for a women's title defence that no-one has managed since 2014.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Jannik Sinner, Carlos Alcaraz, Iga Swiatek and Coco Gauff seek glory

articles.description: South Africa bounce back from defeat to Australia in last week's Rugby Championship opener - earning a battling 30-22 victory over the Wallabies in soggy Cape Town.
articles.title: South Africa 30-22 Australia: Springboks bounce back from opening Rugby Championship defeat

articles.description: India batsman Cheteshwar Pujara announces his retirement from international cricket at the age of 37.
articles.title: Cheteshwar Pujara: India batsman retires from international cricket
